title: IG win = Korea win
body:
Pretty much, right?

Their super carries are Korean. Their coaches are Korean.

It's basically Korea winning Worlds again.

replies.body: rookie duke and the shy lol

Exactly!

And you saw how Rookie and TheShy played.

On Korea's behalf, I'm taking full credit for the LPL's victory at Worlds this year.

Yep, confirmed. Korea carrying this team - which will win Worlds.

Korea still numba wan.
